name: Ext_R2_ReferralRequest_reason
title: Cross-version Extension for R2.ReferralRequest.reason for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents ReferralRequest.reason from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ReferralRequest|1.0.2 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: Reason for referral / transfer of care request
element.definition: Description of clinical condition indicating why referral/transfer of care is requested.  For example:  Pathological Anomalies, Disabled (physical or mental),  Behavioral Management.
element.comment: `ServiceRequest.reasonCode` maps to R5 `ServiceRequest.reason`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
